entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
